felipe.name: Felipe Aragão Pires
felipe.bio: Felipe is a rising sophomore, majoring in Computer Science and Economics. He currently serves as Tech and Media Chair for the BCY. Felipe is interested in ways to connect Computer Science and the humanities. On campus, he is part of the Liberal Party and works as a Student Developer.

davi.name: Davi Lemos da Silva
davi.bio: Davi is a rising sophomore very passionate about his college, Saybrook, his country, Brazil, and his soccer team, Corinthians. He is the current Vice President for the Brazil Club at Yale and plans to major in Computer Science and Psychology. His various interests range from artificial intelligence to traditional Brazilian music and gastronomy. He is also the Vice President of Marketing for AIESEC at Yale and a part of the Yale Club Basketball team.
